targets.rawSql:
SELECT (24*0.4*($before_base + ($before_scale * t1.value::numeric))) AS "value",  t1."device"||'-'||t1."vargroup"||'-'|| t1."varkey" as name, t1.time AS "day", 'energycentre' as node FROM mystreet_energycentre t1
WHERE t1.varkey = 'hDD19' AND t1.time >= $__timeFrom() AND t1.time <= $__timeTo() 
ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT (24*0.4*($after_base + ($after_scale * t1.value::numeric))) AS "value",  t1."device"||'-'||t1."vargroup"||'-now' as name, t1.time AS "day", 'energycentre' as node FROM mystreet_energycentre t1
WHERE t1.varkey = 'hDD19' AND t1.time >= $__timeFrom() AND t1.time <= $__timeTo() 
ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT date_bin('1 day', t1.time, '2023-01-01') as day, (24*(AVG(t1.value::numeric))) AS "value",  t1."device"||'-'||t1."vargroup"||'-'|| t1."varkey" as name FROM mystreet_energycentre t1
WHERE (t1.varkey = 'kw')  AND t1.time >= $__timeFrom() AND t1.time <= $__timeTo() AND device='sitewide'
GROUP BY day, name

SELECT ((SUM($before_base + ($before_scale * t1.value::numeric)) - SUM($after_base + ($after_scale * t1.value::numeric)))/SUM($before_base + ($before_scale * t1.value::numeric))) AS "value",  'pxchange' as name FROM mystreet_energycentre t1
WHERE t1.varkey = 'hDD19' AND t1.time >= $__timeFrom() AND t1.time <= $__timeTo()

SELECT (11.11 * (SUM($before_base + ($before_scale * t1.value::numeric)) - SUM($after_base + ($after_scale * t1.value::numeric)))) AS "value",  'change' as name FROM mystreet_energycentre t1
WHERE t1.varkey = 'hDD19' AND t1.time >= $__timeFrom() AND t1.time <= $__timeTo()

SELECT (0.05 * 11.11 * (SUM($before_base + ($before_scale * t1.value::numeric)) - SUM($after_base + ($after_scale * t1.value::numeric)))) AS "value",  'cash' as name FROM mystreet_energycentre t1
WHERE t1.varkey = 'hDD19' AND t1.time >= $__timeFrom() AND t1.time <= $__timeTo()

SELECT ((0.00018293 / 0.88) * 11.11 * (SUM($before_base + ($before_scale * t1.value::numeric)) - SUM($after_base + ($after_scale * t1.value::numeric)))) AS "value",  'carbon' as name FROM mystreet_energycentre t1
WHERE t1.varkey = 'hDD19' AND t1.time >= $__timeFrom() AND t1.time <= $__timeTo()

SELECT SUM($before_base + ($before_scale * t1.value::numeric)) AS "value",  'before' as name FROM mystreet_energycentre t1
WHERE t1.varkey = 'hDD19' AND t1.time >= $__timeFrom() AND t1.time <= $__timeTo()

SELECT SUM($after_base + ($after_scale * t1.value::numeric)) AS "value",  'after' as name FROM mystreet_energycentre t1
WHERE t1.varkey = 'hDD19' AND t1.time >= $__timeFrom() AND t1.time <= $__timeTo()

SELECT (SUM($before_base + ($before_scale * t1.value::numeric)) - SUM($after_base + ($after_scale * t1.value::numeric))) AS "value",  'change' as name FROM mystreet_energycentre t1
WHERE t1.varkey = 'hDD19' AND t1.time >= $__timeFrom() AND t1.time <= $__timeTo()

SELECT date_bin('1 day', t1.time, '2023-01-01') as day, (MAX(t1.value::numeric) - MIN(t1.value::numeric)) AS "value",  t1."device"||'-'||t1."vargroup"||'-'|| t1."varkey" as name FROM mystreet_energycentre t1
WHERE (t1.varkey = 'gasconsumption')  AND t1.time >= $__timeFrom() AND t1.time <= $__timeTo() AND (t1.value::numeric)>0
GROUP BY day, name

SELECT date_bin('1 day', t1.time, '2023-01-01') as day, (MAX(t1.value::numeric) - MIN(t1.value::numeric)) AS "value",  t1."device"||'-'||t1."vargroup"||'-'|| t1."varkey" as name FROM mystreet_energycentre t1
WHERE (t1.varkey = 'totalgasconsumption')  AND t1.time >= $__timeFrom() AND t1.time <= $__timeTo() 
GROUP BY day, name

SELECT date_bin('1 day', t1.time, '2023-01-01') as day, (MAX(t1.value::numeric) - MIN(t1.value::numeric)) AS "value",  t1."device"||'-'||t1."vargroup"||'-'|| t1."varkey" as name FROM mystreet_energycentre t1
WHERE (t1.varkey = 'htotalgasconsumption')  AND t1.time >= $__timeFrom() AND t1.time <= $__timeTo() 
GROUP BY day, name

SELECT date_bin('1 day', t1.time, '2023-01-01') as day, (MAX(t1.value::numeric) - MIN(t1.value::numeric)) AS "value",  t1."device"||'-'||t1."vargroup"||'-'|| t1."varkey" as name FROM mystreet_energycentre t1
WHERE t1.varkey = 'kwh' AND t1.device = 'sitewide' AND t1.value::numeric>1000 AND t1.time >= $__timeFrom() AND t1.time <= $__timeTo() 
GROUP BY day, name

SELECT ($before_base + ($before_scale * t1.value::numeric)) AS "value",  t1."device"||'-'||t1."vargroup"||'-'|| t1."varkey" as name, t1.time AS "day", 'energycentre' as node FROM mystreet_energycentre t1
WHERE t1.varkey = 'hDD19' AND t1.time >= $__timeFrom() AND t1.time <= $__timeTo() 
ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT ($after_base + ($after_scale * t1.value::numeric)) AS "value",  t1."device"||'-'||t1."vargroup"||'-now' as name, t1.time AS "day", 'energycentre' as node FROM mystreet_energycentre t1
WHERE t1.varkey = 'hDD19' AND t1.time >= $__timeFrom() AND t1.time <= $__timeTo() 
ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT date_bin('1 day', t1.time, '2023-01-01') as day, (AVG(t1.value::numeric)) AS "value",  t1."device"||'-'||t1."vargroup"||'-'|| t1."varkey" as name FROM mystreet_energycentre t1
WHERE (t1.varkey = 'kw')  AND t1.time >= $__timeFrom() AND t1.time <= $__timeTo() AND device='sitewide'
GROUP BY day, name

SELECT date_bin('3 week', t1.time, '2023-01-01') as day, (MAX(t1.value::numeric) - MIN(t1.value::numeric)) AS "gas" FROM mystreet_energycentre t1
WHERE (t1.varkey = 'totalgasconsumption')  AND t1.time >= $__timeFrom() AND t1.time <= $__timeTo() 
GROUP BY day

SELECT date_bin('3 week', t1.time, '2023-01-01') as day, SUM(1030 + (93 * t1.value::numeric)) AS "hdd" FROM mystreet_energycentre t1
WHERE t1.varkey = 'hDD19' AND t1.time >= $__timeFrom() AND t1.time <= $__timeTo() 
GROUP BY day

SELECT date_bin('3 week', t1.time, '2023-01-01') as day, (MAX(t1.value::numeric) - MIN(t1.value::numeric)) AS "gas" FROM mystreet_energycentre t1
WHERE (t1.varkey = 'htotalgasconsumption')  AND t1.time >= $__timeFrom() AND t1.time <= $__timeTo() 
GROUP BY day

SELECT date_bin('1 week', t1.time, '2023-01-01') as day, (MAX(t1.value::numeric) - MIN(t1.value::numeric)) AS "gas" FROM mystreet_energycentre t1
WHERE (t1.varkey = 'totalgasconsumption')  AND t1.time >= $__timeFrom() AND t1.time <= $__timeTo() 
GROUP BY day

SELECT date_bin('1 week', t1.time, '2023-01-01') as day, SUM(1030 + (93 * t1.value::numeric)) AS "hdd" FROM mystreet_energycentre t1
WHERE t1.varkey = 'hDD19' AND t1.time >= $__timeFrom() AND t1.time <= $__timeTo() 
GROUP BY day

SELECT date_bin('1 week', t1.time, '2023-01-01') as day, (MAX(t1.value::numeric) - MIN(t1.value::numeric)) AS "gas" FROM mystreet_energycentre t1
WHERE (t1.varkey = 'htotalgasconsumption')  AND t1.time >= $__timeFrom() AND t1.time <= $__timeTo() 
GROUP BY day

SELECT date_bin('6 hour', t1.time, '2023-01-01') as hour, (MAX(t1.value::numeric) - MIN(t1.value::numeric)) AS "gas",  t1."device" as name FROM mystreet_energycentre t1
WHERE (t1.varkey = 'gasconsumption') AND t1.time >= $__timeFrom() AND t1.time <= $__timeTo() AND (t1.value::numeric)>0
GROUP BY hour, name

SELECT date_bin('6 hour', t1.time, '2023-01-01') as hour, (MAX(t1.value::numeric) - MIN(t1.value::numeric)) AS "kwh" FROM mystreet_energycentre t1
WHERE (t1.varkey = 'kwh')  AND t1.device = 'sitewide' AND t1.time >= $__timeFrom() AND t1.time <= $__timeTo() AND (t1.value::numeric)>5000 
GROUP BY hour
SELECT value::numeric, time, device FROM fn_pulses_per_device_per_hour('mystreet_energycentre','meter','gasconsumption',$__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
SELECT value::numeric, time, device FROM fn_pulses_per_device_per_hour('mystreet_energycentre','meter','gasconsumption',$__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())
SELECT value::numeric, time FROM fn_counter_to_rate('mystreet_energycentre','system','meter','totalgasconsumption',$__timeFrom(), $__timeTo())

SELECT t1.value::numeric AS "value",  t1."device"||'-'||t1."vargroup"||'-'|| t1."varkey" as name, t1.time AS "time", 'energycentre' as node FROM mystreet_energycentre t1
WHERE t1.varkey = 'hDD19' AND t1.time >= $__timeFrom() AND t1.time <= $__timeTo() 
ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT ($before_base + ($before_scale * t1.value::numeric)) AS "value",  t1."device"||'-'||t1."vargroup"||'-'|| t1."varkey" as name, t1.time AS "day", 'energycentre' as node FROM mystreet_energycentre t1
WHERE t1.varkey = 'hDD19' AND t1.time >= $__timeFrom() AND t1.time <= $__timeTo() 
ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT ($after_base + ($after_scale * t1.value::numeric)) AS "value",  t1."device"||'-'||t1."vargroup"||'-now' as name, t1.time AS "day", 'energycentre' as node FROM mystreet_energycentre t1
WHERE t1.varkey = 'hDD19' AND t1.time >= $__timeFrom() AND t1.time <= $__timeTo() 
ORDER BY time ASC
